distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for qemu fixes the following issues:

A new feature was added:

- Support EPYC vCPU type (bsc#1052825 fate#324038)

Also a mitigation for a security problem has been applied:

- CVE-2017-5715: QEMU was updated to allow passing through new MSR and CPUID flags from 
  the host VM to the CPU, to allow enabling/disabling branch prediction features in the
  Intel CPU. (bsc#1068032)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirect branch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
